summary: This document is an email chain from September 2021 between a Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office and an unidentified recipient, arranging a call to discuss the Epstein case. It shows ongoing investigative activity years after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: A Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office is attempting to schedule a call regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the Special Agent wants the recipient to speak with regarding the Epstein case.

connections.description: The Special Agent indicates they want the recipient to speak with both 'myself and SSA', suggesting they are colleagues working together on the Epstein case.

events.title: Call Scheduling Regarding Epstein Case
events.description: A Special Agent from the DOJ OIG's New York Field Office exchanges emails to schedule a call to discuss the Epstein case with an unidentified recipient.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office was actively investigating the Epstein case as of September 2021.
The communication shows coordination between a Special Agent and a Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) on the case.
The document is an email chain from 2021, indicating ongoing official interest in the Epstein matter years after his death.
